code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import"./Footer.scss";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import emoji from"react-easy-emoji";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Footer(){const{t}=useTranslation();const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"5px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode footer-text":"footer-text",children:emoji(`${t("footer.madeWith")} ❤️`)})})});}
